title: An S Grade Count
body: Perhaps riot should introduce a S Grade count after your reach mastery 7? I've gotten so many S-, S and S+ grades for Lux but I feel like these achievements are all wasted. If there was a counter next to the champion in the profile so other people can see how many S's you get after you reach mastery 7 this would be super awesome.

replies.body: how about % S, just for personal satisfaction

I want anything to be honest.. just something that marks how good you are at a champion despite getting mastery 7. Because you could have lucked out and gotten a team that carried you to an S. But to constantly get S's and to have a profile that shows it, that's a different story.
